```{R}
data = iris
for (idx1 in 1:(length(colnames(data))-1)){
    for (idx2 in idx1:(length(colnames(data))-1)){
        if(idx1==idx2){
            next
        }
        x=data[,idx1]
        y=data[,idx2]
        title=paste("Iris Data",colnames(data)[idx1],"vs",colnames(data)[idx2])
        plot(x,y,main=title,xlab=colnames(data)[idx1],
            ylab=colnames(data)[idx2],col=data$Species,
            xlim = c(min(x,y),max(x,y)), ylim = c(min(x,y),max(x,y)),
            pch=21,cex=1,type='p')
        abline(0,1,col=2)
        fit=lm(y~x)
        abline(fit,col=3)
        legend("topleft",c("Diagonal line","Fitted line",
            paste("R-square =",round(summary(fit)$r.squared,4)),
            paste("y = ",round(fit$coefficients[2],2),
            " x + (",round(fit$coefficients[1],2),")",sep="")),
            lty=c(1,1,0,0),col=c(2,3,"white","white"),
            bg="white")
    }
}
```
